channel.title: A little help would be appreciated :]
channel.description:
Any one know how to change what you start off wearing
Also i need to know how to change the starting location
Ty.

item.title: A little help would be appreciated :]
item.dc:creator: @p0unding p0unding
item.description:
@p0unding wrote:

[quote=“invalid name, post:3, topic:128234”]// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
[/quote]
what the hell was that about?

Dennis just follow what I posted, most of what he said was leeched and changed a bit, and
mostly wrong…

Read full topic

item.title: A little help would be appreciated :]
item.dc:creator: @p0unding p0unding
item.description:
@p0unding wrote:

[quote=“invalid name, post:3, topic:128234”]ok i will help ,
first off i will help you with the starting items open up player.java and search for

playerEquipment[playerHat]=

change all the numbers to item id’s that you want to start of as.

to change npc starting postion open up player.java search for

		// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet

if you dont have that search for

		teleportToX =

and just change the numbers after that to the coords you want people to start of at.[/quote]

I just posted what he needed help with no need to post again…

Read full topic
item.source: A little help would be appreciated :]

item.title: A little help would be appreciated :]
item.dc:creator: @invalid_name1 invalid name
item.description:
@invalid_name1 wrote:

ok i will help ,
first off i will help you with the starting items open up player.java and search for

playerEquipment[playerHat]=

change all the numbers to item id’s that you want to start of as.

to change npc starting postion open up player.java search for

		// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet

if you dont have that search for

		teleportToX =

and just change the numbers after that to the coords you want people to start of at.

Read full topic
item.source: A little help would be appreciated :]

item.title: A little help would be appreciated :]
item.dc:creator: @p0unding p0unding
item.description:
@p0unding wrote:

-To change what you start in-

-search in player.handler and find the ID for something you are already wearing.

-Then replace with IDS you want.

-and for starting position search the coords for where you already start. and change
them to the choords you want to start.

Read full topic
